name: Rhum & Gun
description:
Your ship is under attack ! With only one shotgun, you’ll need to coordinate with your teammate in order to defeat these evil skeletons. Each salva is launched when your mate grabs the weapon ... But be careful, the recoil is strong on this thing !

Rhum&Gun is a 2-players arcade co-op experience. It can be played with only one keyboard… Or two Xbox controllers :)

The music of this game has been composed with 1-second samples and only one note.

Controls (keyboard) :

Player 1 :

  • ZQSD : Moving around
  • Directional arrows : Character orientation
  • E/Space : Throw Shotgun/Yell at teammate (if the Shotgun is not equipped).

Player 2 :

  • OKLM : Moving around
  • 8456 : Character orientation.
  • Enter (numpad): Throw Shotgun/Yell at teammate (if the Shotgun is not equipped).

Controls (Xbox Controller) : 

  • Directionnal pad (left) : Moving around 
  • Directional pad (right) : Character orientation
  • X/A/RB/LB/RT/LT : Throw Shotgun/Yell at teammate (if the Shotgun is not equipped).
